text: vedam nalkappettavarute atukkal ni ellavidha drstantavum keant cennalum avar ninre khib laye pintutarunnatalla. avarute khib laye niyum pintutarunnatalla. avaril oru vibhagam marrearu vibhagattinrekhib laye pintutarukayumilla. ninakk sariyaya ariv vannukittiya sesam niyennanum avarute icchakale pinparriyal niyum atikramakarikalute kuttattil tanneyayirikkum
